plot: Embodied on the only planet with liquid water, an extraterrestrial spirit is guided by dreams of his blind nemesis's waking life.
title: Julian's an Alien
plot_es: Embodied on the only planet with liquid water, an extraterrestrial spirit is guided by dreams of his blind nemesis's waking life.
plot_en: Embodied on the only planet with liquid water, an extraterrestrial spirit is guided by dreams of his blind nemesis's waking life.
